title: Mini-Ep 149: Dressing Room Dreams and CoQ10
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 149: Dressing Room Dreams and CoQ10
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree reminisce about trying on clothes in a store dressing room, discuss how to deal with the coming cold and flu season during a pandemic, and hear from listeners about pregnancy loss, a non-committal boyfriend, reframing the anti-aging narr...
description:
Kate and Doree reminisce about trying on clothes in a store dressing room, discuss how to deal with the coming cold and flu season during a pandemic, and hear from listeners about pregnancy loss, a non-committal boyfriend, reframing the anti-aging narrative, and why CoQ10 is so beloved.


Activity/Word of the Day: Eat ice cream and watch TV in the tub.


Follow us on Twitter and Instagram and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).

To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

 

  • CALM - For 40% off a Calm Premium subscription, head to calm.com/forever35.
  • SIGNATURE HARDWARE - Real-life isn’t always perfect, but with Signature Hardware it is beautiful. Visit signaturehardware.com/FOREVER35 to find your style today.
  • GLOSSIER - For a limited time, new customers can get 10% off your first order at Glossier.com/podcast/FOREVER35. 
  • ROTHY’S - For free shipping and free returns/exchanges, visit rothys.com/forever35.
  •  BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.
  • JENNI KAYNE - Get 20% off your first order at jennikayne.com when you use code FOREVER35 at checkout.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
